feedbackForm.contactSupport: Please contact <1>support@faa.st</1> so we can fix any issues regarding your swap!
feedbackForm.assetInfoPlaceholder: Please provide a URL to info about asset...
feedbackForm.featurePlaceholder: Please describe the feature you would like added to Faa.st...
feedbackForm.designPlaceholder: Please describe what you like or dislike about the Faa.st design...
feedbackForm.bugPlaceholder: Please describe any bugs you encountered using Faa.st...
feedbackForm.helpImprove: Help us improve Faa.st with your feedback!

walletTypes.ledgerDescription: Ledger offers smartcard-based crypto asset hardware wallets bringing optimal protection level to your bitcoins, ethereums, ripple and more - without sacrificing usability or control.
walletTypes.trezorSlogan: The safe place for your coins.
walletTypes.trezorDescription: Trezor offers you a secure vault for your digital assets. Store bitcoins, litecoins, passwords, logins, and keys without worries.
walletTypes.blockstackSlogan: The easiest way to start building decentralized blockchain apps.
walletTypes.blockstackDescription: Blockstack is building an ecosystem that gives your users control over their fundamental digital rights.
walletTypes.metamaskDescription: MetaMask is a bridge that allows you to visit the distributed web of tomorrow in your browser today. It allows you to run Ethereum dApps right in your browser.
walletTypes.mistSlogan: Mist. Browse and use Ðapps on the Ethereum network.
walletTypes.mistDescription: The Mist browser is the tool of choice to browse and use Ðapps.
walletTypes.paritySlogan: Blockchain Infrastructure for the Decentralised Web.
walletTypes.parityDescription: Parity Technologies builds core blockchain infrastructure. From Parity Ethereum, the most advanced Ethereum client, to Polkadot, the next-generation interoperable blockchain network.
walletTypes.coinbaseSlogan: The easiest and most secure crypto wallet.
walletTypes.coinbaseDescription: Coinbase: the simple, safe way to buy, manage and sell your cryptocurrency.
walletTypes.trustSlogan: Secure wallet for Ethereum, ERC20, ERC223 & ERC721 tokens.
walletTypes.trustDescription: Trust Wallet is the best ethereum wallet and multi cryptocurrency wallet to store your favourite ERC721 & ERC20 tokens.
walletTypes.statusDescription: With Status you can chat, browse and transact securely in an open source community committed to bringing the power of Ethereum and a more distributed internet to your pocket.

statuses.unsuccessful: Order was unsuccessful, please contact support@faa.st
statuses.sendTxError: Failed to send deposit transaction, please try again
statuses.signingError: Failed to sign deposit transaction, please try again
statuses.contactSupport: There may be an issue. Contact support@faa.st for more info.
statuses.failedToCheckDepositTx: Failed to check deposit transaction status

connect.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your keystore file

rebalance.empty: This portfolio is empty. To begin swapping you must <1>add a wallet</1> first.
rebalance.instructions2: Drag a slider left to decrease weight of an asset. Use
rebalance.instructions4: Drag a slider right to increase weight of an asset. Use
rebalance.instructions5: to add a new asset.<1/><2>(Note: To increase weight, you must have decreased weight of another asset)</2>
rebalance.readOnly: This wallet is read-only. You need to <1><2>connect your wallet</2></1> in order to trade assets.

widget.omitted: <0>When omitted, a variable market rate is used.</0>
widget.approxSend: <0>Approximately how much you need to send. Click Create to receive a guaranteed quote.</0>
widget.expectSend: <0>The amount we expect you to send.</0>
widget.approxReceive: <0>Approximately how much you will receive. Click Create to receive a guaranteed quote.</0>
widget.guaranteeReceive: <0>The amount you are guaranteed to receive.</0>
widget.acceptTerms: I accept the <1> Faa.st Terms & Conditions</1>
widget.pleaseNote: Please note: The maximum you can swap is
widget.notEnoughEth: This wallet does not have enough ETH to cover the gas fees. Please deposit some ETH and try again.
widget.sendAmountAtLeast: Send amount must be at least
widget.sendAmountGreaterThan: Send amount cannot be greater than
widget.cannotSendMoreThanHave: Cannot send more than you have.

swapSubmit.geoLimit: Send amount cannot be greater than $<1></1> <2>due to your location.</2>
swapSubmit.multipleSwaps: The following swaps will take place to save the changes you made to your portfolio. Please review them and click '<1></1>' to proceed.
swapSubmit.timer: * Quoted rates are guaranteed if submitted within:
swapSubmit.additionalFees: ** Additional fees may apply depending on the asset being sent and the wallet you're using.

ethInstructions.confirm: Please confirm the following transaction details when prompted by your wallet.

blocked.sorry: Sorry, you are accessing faa.st from a blocked location. If you are getting this message in error, you can learn more <1>here.</1>

walletInfoModal.metamask1: <0></0> is a desktop browser extension that provides an Ethereum wallet. You can get it <2>here.</2>
walletInfoModal.metamask2: If you already have <1></1>, ensure the extension is enabled on this browser.
walletInfoModal.mist1: <0></0> is a desktop web browser with a built-in Ethereum wallet. You can get it <2>here.</2>
walletInfoModal.mist2: If you already have <1></1>, open <3>faa.st</3> using its built in web browser.
walletInfoModal.status1: <0></0> is a mobile Ethereum OS for iOS and Android. You can learn more about it <2>here.</2>
walletInfoModal.status2: If you already have <1></1>, open <3>faa.st</3> using its built in web browser.
walletInfoModal.coinbase1: <0></0> is a mobile Ethereum OS for iOS and Android. You can get it <2>here</2> or use one of the links below.
walletInfoModal.coinbase2: If you already have <1></1>, open <3>faa.st</3> using its built in web browser.

createWalletModal.ack1: The <1></1> file can be used to send any funds it contains.
createWalletModal.ack2: The <1></1> file contains a sensitive private key that is encrypted and can only be accessed using the password I entered.
createWalletModal.ack3: Faast does not have a backup of the file or password. This <1></1> was generated in my web browser and was never sent over the internet.
createWalletModal.ack4: If I lose access to the file or forget the password I forfeit all funds it contains.
createWalletModal.ack5: I have downloaded and stored this file in a secure location on my computer.
createWalletModal.ack6: The <1></1> file, in combination with my password, can be used to send funds using applications other than Faast.
createWalletModal.agree: I understand and agree with all of the above
createWalletModal.enterPrivateKey: Enter the private key of your existing Ethereum wallet.
createWalletModal.enterPassword: Enter a password for your <1>{{walletName}}</1>. Please make a note of your password. You will not be able to access the funds in your <3>{{walletName}}</3> without your password.
createWalletModal.passwordLength: Please at least 8 characters. It is important to secure your wallet with a strong password.
